item.title: Npc Dicer Help
item.dc:creator: @eighteenmilla eighteenmilla
item.description:
@eighteenmilla wrote:

sendNpcChat1(“Congratulations, you rolled “+ misc.random(55) +”.”, c.talkingNpc, “Host”);
c.nextChat =0;
c.sendMessage(“You Win!”);
c.sendMessage(“The Npc gives you a certificate!”);
c.getItems().addItem(3114, 1);
}
if(random2 <= 54) //begin lose{
{
sendNpcChat1(“Sorry, you rolled “+ misc.random(54) +”.”, c.talkingNpc, “Host”);
c.nextChat =0;
c.sendMessage(“You Lose!”);
c.sendMessage(“The Npc takes your certificate!”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(3114, 1);
}

I want to add a specific range from 54 to 1 and 55 to 100 i would like to know how to do this

Read full topic
